CustomField.description: This field is marked as ‘True’ manually to indicate that the carrier cannot be worked currently (portal lockout, LSI, etc). Marking this field as ‘True’ blocks carrier orders associated to this carrier from being assigned out.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Mark this field as ‘True’ to indicate that the carrier cannot be worked due to a portal lockout or LSI. When this field is ‘True’, Carrier Orders will not be assigned out under this carrier.
CustomField.label: Carrier Fulfillment Blocked
